origin.nestweaver-origin.nestweaver.desc: Powerful arachnid matriarch. Carry the nest within, and let your children walk beside you as shield and shadow.
origin.nestweaver-origin.nestweaver.name: Nestweaver
power.nestweaver-origin.fragility.descri: You have two hearts less health.
power.nestweaver-origin.fragility.name: Fragility
power.nestweaver-origin.master_of_webs.d: You can freely more through and climb cobwebs, trap enemies and see anyone intruding your nest through vibrations in the web.
power.nestweaver-origin.night_vision.des: Your eyes are equipped to lurk in the shadows.
power.nestweaver-origin.pest_control.des: You take additional damage to fire.
power.nestweaver-origin.spawn_children.d: Use ability to hatch two spiderlings that will follow and protect you. Look after them, they are your blood.
power.nestweaver-origin.spider_kinship.d: Spiders and Cave Spiders are not aggressive towards you, and you are able to feed them.
power.nestweaver-origin.venomous_bite.de: Hitting an enemy with an empty hand will inflict poison and restore some of your hunger.
